name: Geo Deals
author: HikeOrders

sections.description:
Geo Deals is a discount engine that gives suitable discount codes to visitors and maximizes your revenue. Geo Deals helps adjust discounts based on the country’s purchase power parity (PPP) to boost sales and revenue growth.

Introduction

Most digital products are not affordable due to the purchase power parity of the visitor’s country. It shoos off customers from less economically developed countries, in turn impacts your sales and revenue. This is where Geo Deals helps your business with it’s rule based discounting engine.

Supported Use Case

Geo Deals support multiple use cases such as

  • Discount banner
  • Store wide discounts
  • Country wise discounts
  • Purchase power parity deals
  • Multiple offer discounts
  • Shipping discount banner
  • Landing page discounts
  • Festival discounts
  • Offers widget
  • Location based discount
  • Discount distribution engine
  • Multiple discount campaigns

Other Features

  • Well designed widget with excellent user experience
  • Highly customizable widget
  • Apply your brand colors
  • Multiple trigger icons and size
  • Multiple trigger positions for both mobile and desktop
  • Exceptional admin dashboard

Price intelligently by the market’s willingness to pay

Optimize discounts based on the purchase power parity of the visitor’s country. This technique of dynamic pricing boosts your sales revenue growth.

Easy configuration, no coding is required

Setup and run your discount campaigns without the help of a developer. It’s 100% no-code solution

How It works

After installation, any visitor on the site can see a Geo Deals widget and open it to learn more about your business, customer reviews, awards, and more.

Installation

Installation takes less than 3 minutes. Just install the plugin and save it with a widget Id. That’s it.

View Demo

Explore how the app works on a precedent website.

View demo

Also Works For

  • WordPress.com
  • Woo Commerce
  • BuddyPress
  • BBPress
  • Easy Digital Download
  • JigoShop
  • IgnitionDeck

External Service

This plugin relay on third party service called Geo Deals. This plugin makes it easy to integrate Geo Deals with WordPress.

Terms of Use | Privacy Policy

Pricing

This plugin is free to use. But the external service used in this plugin has a subscription fee. View pricing and free trial details here

About Us

Geo Deals is developed and maintained by HikeOrders. For support, contact us at team@hikeorders.com.
sections.installation:
1. Extract geodeals.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. In the admin panel under plugins, activate Geo Deals.
  3. Go to Geo Deals Set Up Page Under Settings
  4. Here you need to add the Widget ID in the text box given and Save it. Follow the instructions given in the setup page to get Widget ID.
  5. Were you expecting more steps? Sorry to disappoint!
sections.faq:
How do you measure page-views?

Every page your users visit on your website is counted as a page view. That means if a user visits your website and has viewed 5 pages (be it the same page 5 times or 5 different pages) then it is counted as 5 page views. In other words, every time full trust java-script loader is requested it is counted as a one page-view.

Do Geo Deals affect loading speed ?

Absolutely not! We have taken care of it. Our developer team keeps optimizing for performance on an ongoing basis. We keep improving on all possible factors that affect performance.

Is Geo Deals GDPR and CCPA Compliance ?

Yes! Geo Deals doesn’t store any identifiable personal information of your visitors.

short_description: Geo Deals helps to give away the right discount offers to every visitor via a banner and discount widget
